Title: New model every day! Mistral Large 2!
introduction: Integrated Mistral Large 2 into Keywords AI, try it out in our model playground!

New.description: Integrated Groq tool use models into the platform.
You can add notes to each log, which is helpful when running evaluations.
Added Customer ID and Thread ID columns on the Logs page.
You can now run batch evaluations on specified metrics through an API call now.

Improved.description: Added many shortcuts to the Users side panel.
Improved the UI of the Users page.
